title: EXAMPLES OF SMARTER CHOICE INGREDIENTS
author: Sign In
cleaned_text: We rely on innovative scientific research to identify and amplify the many benefits of naturally based products outperform national brands. In nearly every case, we find natural ingredients to be the best, most effective, and healthiest option. Of course, "natural" does In some cases, man-made compounds to more effective than raw, volatile sources. In our only sufficiently as safe effective Each year, we spend millions of dollars on research to determine the best sources, the safest and most effective and sustain the environment. Each year, we discover new secrets that nature is willing to share with us. We are careful to use only safe, proven, and trusted ingredients - nothing harsh or dangerous. And nothing that would cause harm to you or your family. Science allows us to put nature to work.
